main.name: Elizabeth Lipton
main.bio: I'm a developer with a strong digital marketing background. I have experience with a variety of languages, frameworks and platforms (check some of them out below) and enjoy learning new things. I play broomball sometimes and often stop to pet dogs.

resume.skillmessage: I have experience with the following languages, frameworks, and programs. This is not an all-inclusive list.

testimonials.text: I'm a competitive broomball player and travel to several co-ed and women's tournaments throughout the year (I'm now a 3x National Champion). I'm on the board for the Cincinnati Broomball Association, and we host leagues for any skill level - talk to me if you ever want to try it out!
I'm the oldest of five kids (plus six step-siblings). Whenever all five of us get together, we play Mario Kart and it gets intense. I try to practice leading up to sibling events.

I've been a volunteer at Save the Animals Foundation since 2014, and adopted one of my dogs, Zooey, from the shelter. I really love dogs, and my life mostly revolves around Zooey and my second dog, Phil.
I'm more of a winter weather person and love snow.
I've been a member of KW Crossfit since 2017, and I've loved learning a new sport and the community there. But I promise I won't talk about it too much. Unless you want to talk about it.
I love cake, but mostly for the icing.
